Articles.Content:
Hello guys, new KSPer here checking in!

Actually IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve been playing KSP for a couple months, and really enjoy it. IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve always been interested in astronomy, space travels etc and I also have a tendency to get addicted to simulation games. So itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no surprise I bought KSPÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Concerning the game, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m slowly getting familiar with interplanetary travels, rendez-vous, docking etc which makes the game even more fun and adds so many possibilities! IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m currently trying to make Apollo-style interplanetary travels. Not sure if itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an efficient way but it feels good to travel in style

(sadly while performing some early tests, Bob, Bill and Jebediah lost their lives due to parachute failure/bug).

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

Here is Melvin Kerman landed at Dres (terrible destination if you ask me), ready to take off and dock with the CM.

I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t really use mods except MechJeb for the additional information and also some visual enhancement stuffs.

ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s it pretty much. The community looks great here, which makes this game even more fantastic

Welcome Thoendi!

Efficiency, scmeficiency. If you want to tour the system- Apollo style, you go right ahead. Do what you like and have fun.

This is a very helpful and kind community. Don't be afraid to ask for suggestions.

Welcome to the forum!

If you're looking for some other interest ideas, check out the challenges forum. I reckon there are some challenges that might interest you.

Welcome to the forums! As others have already mentioned, feel free to ask questions if you get stuck on anything; we have a number of knowledgeable users who are quite willing to share what they've learned with other players. I also maintain a little list of tutorials and other resources called the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked through my signature. Feel free to share your accomplishments with the community as well.

Hope this helps!

That cow flag....

...is awesome!

Welcome to the forums.

Thanks for the welcome guys!

I'll sure look at everything you suggested. I just had a quick look at the Drawing Board and already found a few answers to my questions
Glad to hear it's proven useful

...is awesome!

Yep, gotta agree. I haven't customized any flags yet, but feel a sudden urge. Oh, and to the OP - welcome! And you will find that many agree, Dres is kind of a body that you just tend to skip over between Duna and Jool. Ceres without the rest of the asteroid belt.

Thanks!

I wanted something different for the flag. Couldn't come up with anything better than a Pink Floyd album cover. Which is in my opinion one of the best things to spread throughout the universe

I don't think I'll ever go to Dres again. I have a flag there, good enough! Will do the exact same thing with Moho and Eeloo which appear to be boring places as well...
